uls-desc: Ehe nọ gọalọna nọtẹn lọ zantọ nado mọ aliho voovo lẹ nado dè ogbè dé podọ bosọ diọ tẹnmẹ sọgbe hẹ nujlomẹ ogbè tọn lẹ
ext-uls-undo-language-tooltip-text-local: Ogbè ada wiki tọn ehe ko yin didiọ. Pọn [[Special:GlobalPreferences|nujlomẹ lẹ lẹdo aihọnpe]] towe nado diọ ogbè na ada wiki tọn lẹpo.
uls-betafeature-desc: Do todohukanji ogbè tọn he ma ṣù hia, he mẹ ogbè he yin nujọnu na we hugan lẹ wẹ yin didohia.
ext-uls-display-settings-desc: Dè ogbè he yin yiyizan na titotowhinnu lẹ po wunmẹ wekun tọn lẹ po.
ext-uls-language-buttons-help: Diọ ogbè todohukanji lẹ tọn. E ma na yinuwado ogbè  nuhe yé bẹhẹn tọn ji.
ext-uls-display-settings-font-settings: Nujlomẹ lẹ na wunmẹ wekun tọn
ext-uls-display-settings-anon-log-in-cta: [[Special:UserLogin|Log in]] nado de ogbè devo na todohukanji lẹ.
ext-uls-webfonts-settings-title: Mọ wekun lẹ yi ni a dó hudo etọn
ext-uls-webfonts-settings-info: Mọ wekun he bu lẹ yi ma kanbiọ bosọ nadotẹnmẹ nado ṣian wekun he jlomẹ lẹ.
ext-uls-webfonts-select-for-ui-info: Wekun he yin yiyizan na awusọhia nọtẹn lọ zantọ tọn
ext-uls-webfonts-select-for-content-info: Wekun he yin yiyizan na nubẹhẹn
ext-uls-back-to-display-settings: Lẹkọ do nujlomẹ awusọhia nọtẹn lọ tọn lẹ
ext-uls-input-settings-desc: Ogbè devo mẹ wẹ a to nukàn do yà?
ext-uls-input-settings-ui-language: Ogbè he yin yiyizan na wekinkan
ext-uls-back-to-input-settings: Lẹkọ do nujlomẹ lẹ na wekinkan
ext-uls-ime-help: Lehe e nọ yin yiyizan do
ext-uls-input-disable-info: Nuyizan wekinkan tọn lẹ ko yin susú.
ext-uls-input-settings-noime: Wunmẹ wekinkan tọn depope ma tin na ogbè ehe.
ext-uls-input-disable-notification: Nuyizan wekinkan tọn lẹ ko yin susú
ext-uls-input-disable-notification-info-: To nujlomẹ ogbè tọn lẹ mẹ, a sọgan tá nuyizan wekinkan tọn lẹ to whedepopenu.p
To nujlomẹ ogbè tọn lẹ he bọdo todohukanji ogbè tọn go, a sọgan hùn nuyizan wekinkan tọn lẹ to whedepopenu.
ext-uls-compact-link-info: Ogbè lẹpo (yin dide jẹnukọn sọn nuhe hiẹ po mẹdevo lẹ po nọ yawu dè mẹ)
ext-uls-compact-language-links-preferenc: Zán [[$1|todohukanji ogbè tọn]], po ogbè he yin nujọnu na we lẹ po.
ext-uls-compact-no-results: Weda ehe ma tin to ogbè he mẹ a to dindin te.
ext-uls-setlang-error: Nuṣiwa dé wá aimẹ to whenue ogbè he a dè to yinyin vivọjlado. Nuṣiwa: $1
ext-uls-setlang-message: Kanṣiṣa weda lẹ tọn he a hodo lọ biọ dọ awusọhia dona yin yinyọnẹn to $1 ($2)
ext-uls-setlang-heading: A jlo na diọ ogbè awusọhia tọn wẹ ya?
